name: Snufel Free Guest Posting
author: Snufel

sections.description:
Snufel Free Guest Posting has made it easier than ever for webmasters to accept guest post from their frontend for free. This plugin features an intuitive setup – all you need is just 1 shortcode and you will be done. Moreover, you have full control over guest post regulations with adjustable settings to select the minimum word count of accepted posts. Adjustable settings let you specify the minimum amount of words for a guest post, ensuring that the content you receive is of a high standard. Get started today and get free, high quality content for your website.

Here is a summary of what you can do:

  • Easily acquire high quality content for your website from guest posts
  • Easy configuration for better quality control in the settings area
  • 1 Simple shortcode for frontend guestpost submission
  • Interactive frontend form and built-in email notifications

Snufel is an online marketplace for small business owners who would like to list their products or services for free. We encourage members to accept guestposts to build connections with other similar business owners and get high quality content in return. Likewise, we are accepting your product listings in our website as long as it provides value to our visitors. If you are interested to gain extra exposure in our marketplace, register an account today!
sections.installation:
To install, you just need to follow these steps

  1. Upload the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the Settings page and configure.
sections.faq:
Will the guest post publish automatically?

You can choose to let it publish automatically or save as draft. If you save it as draft, you will need to vet the content in the database automatically.

short_description: Accept guestpost from your frontend for free. It is very easy to setup, just 1 shortcode [free_guestpost_form] and you are done.
